directions.step:
Place jelly and thyme in microwavable 2-cup measure. Microwave uncovered on High 45 to 60 seconds, stirring every 15 seconds, until jelly is melted; or heat jelly and thyme in 1-quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until jelly is melted. Gradually stir in oil, stirring until smooth.
*Betty Crocker's Great Grilling Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V4 #306 by Michael McLaughlin <mmclaughlin@micronet.net> on Nov 25, 1997
